mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.permissions FROM user_role as ur LEFT JOIN `role` as r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id` WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.`status` = 0

select id, user_name as userName, password, nick_name as nickName, real_name as realName, `number`, id_number as idNumber, campus,college,major,avatar,telephone,dormitory,email,sex,birthday, user_type as userType,status, create_time as createTime, create_by as createBy, update_by as updateBy, update_time as updateTime, remark from user where id=#{id}
